name: gmail-classic
description: CSS for reverting Gmail to the Classic Theme
author: Andrew Powell <andrew@shellscape.org>

scripts.build:task:manifest: f(){ cat package.json | mustache - build/$1/manifest.json > dist/$1/manifest.json; }; f
scripts.build:task:zip: f(){ cd dist/$1 && npx bestzip ../$1.zip ./* && cd ../..;}; f
